Name: Egress
checklistText:
Final Subsystems Configuration for Egress

Purpose of Final Subsystem Configuration for Egress 
procedure is to verify status of LM controls before 
cabin depressurization. Crew have donned PLSS and are 
receiving PLSS oxygen (automatic in Reentry)

For ECS controls not listed, refer to ECS Basic 
(Unstaged) procedure.

Prerequisite:
	Use the C-menu to open the CREW MEMBERS window,
	then MANAGE CREW. Activate the EVA SUIT/PLSS for
	the CDR and the LMP before proceeding.


ECS:
1.	SUIT GAS DIVERTER vlv - PULL EGRESS
	PRESS REG A vlv - EGRESS 
	PRESS REG B vlv - EGRESS 
	DES O2 vlv - OPEN
	SUIT ISOL vlv (LMP) - SUIT DISC 
	SUIT ISOL vlv (CDR) - SUIT DISC 
	CABIN GAS RETUIN vlv - EGRESS 
	CO2 CANISTER SEL vlv - PRIM 
	SUIT CIRCUIT RELIEF vlv - AUTO

Panel 16:
2.	CB ECS:
		SUIT FAN Î”P - open 
		SUIT FAN 2 - open  
		LCG PUMP - open 
		CABIN REPRESS - open 
		CABIN FAN CONT - close 

Panel 11:
3.	CB ECS:
		CABIN FAN - open 
		GLYCOL PUMP 2 - close
		GLYCOL PUMP 1 - close
		GLYCOL PUMP AUTO TRNFR - close

Panel 2:
4.	GLYOOL sel - PUMP 1 
	SUIT FAN sel - 2 
	O2/H2O QTY MON sel - DES 2 
	ECS:
		PRESS ind pwr fail lt - off 
		GLYCOL ind pwr fail lt - off 
		QUANTITY ind pwr fail lt - off 
		GLYCOL comp caut lt - off 
		SUIT FAN comp caut lt - off 
		CO2 comp caut lt - off 
		H2O SEP comp caut lt - off

5.	Verify EPS Basic (Unstaged)

Panel 14:
6.	Critical displays are as follows:
	EPS:
		LMP BAT 1 tb - gray
		LMP BAT 2 tb - TBD 
		CDR BAT 3 tb - TBD 
		CDR BAT 4 tb - gray
		LUNAR BAT tb - TBD 
		DES BATS tb - gray
		BAT 5 NORMAL LMP FEED tb - bp 
		BAT 5 BACK UP CDR FEED tb - bp 
		BAT 6 NORMAL CDR FEED tb - bp 
		BAT 6 BACKUP LMP FEED tb - bp

Panel 3:
7.	LTG: EXTERIOR LTG sel - OFF

Panel 16:
8.	CB LTG: TRACK - open

Panel 11:
9.	CB S/C: ATT DIR CONT - open

Panel 8:
10.	ED:
		MASTER ARM sw - OFF
		STAGE sw - SAFE

Panel 1:
11.	ENG THR CONT: ENG ARM sw - OFF

Panel 3:
12.	S/C: PGNS & AGS sw - OFF
